housePlans.title: House Plans Management
housePlans.subtitle: Manage all your house floor plans
housePlans.createNewPlanDesc: Enter a name and optional description

housePlan.title: 2D House Plan Editor
housePlan.subtitle: Draw your house floor plan and add wall information
housePlan.drawInstructions: Click twice to draw a wall (start → end)
housePlan.selectInstructions: Click a wall to edit its properties
housePlan.moveInstructions: Drag and drop walls to reposition them
housePlan.deleteInstructions: Click a wall to remove it
housePlan.wallListDesc: All walls in your floor plan. Click to edit.
housePlan.noWalls: No walls yet. Use the draw tool to get started.
housePlan.wallMetadataDesc: Edit the name, thickness, and structure of this wall
housePlan.wallStructureDesc: Link this wall to a defined wall structure
housePlan.noStructuresAvailable: No wall structures available. Create them in 'Wall Structures'.

materialLibrary.title: Material Library
materialLibrary.description: Create reusable materials (e.g., wood, brick, insulation) with name and thickness.

structures.title: Wall Structures
structures.description: Create wall structures and add materials from your library.

flexibleItems.title: Flexible Items
flexibleItems.description: Manage user-defined items with custom properties that can be placed in house plans.

dialog.description: Define name, description, and custom properties for this item.
dialog.propertiesHint: Define any properties in JSON format

maintenanceItems.title: Maintenance Items
maintenanceItems.description: Track and schedule maintenance tasks for your home items.
maintenanceItems.empty: No maintenance items yet. Click 'Add Maintenance Item' to get started.
maintenanceItems.demoNote: This is a demonstration page. The maintenance manager component is used below and can be added to any feature by passing an entityType and entityId.

dialog.description: Create a maintenance schedule for tracking recurring tasks.
dialog.recurringHint: This maintenance task will repeat automatically at the specified interval.
